parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From apo and krino; to conclude for oneself, i.e. to respond; by Hebraism to begin to speak.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
A tunic, garment, undergarment. Of foreign origin; a tunic or shirt.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From meta and didomi; to give over, i.e. Share.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Dative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Food of any kind. From the base of bibrosko; food, especially articles allowed or forbidden by the Jewish law.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
In like manner, similarly, in the same way, equally. Adverb from homoios; similarly.
